name: Extension-CareConnect-MedicationPrescribingAgency-1
description: An Extension to hold the type of organisation/setting responsible for authorising and issuing a medication outside of the organisation/setting delivering the patient care. If no prescription (e.g. OTC) then recorded as "self-prescribed".
